title: Kerning double check
content:
Hi guys & gals

I;ve been staring at this monitor for 26hours doing 4 different project – so my eyes had gone dead blurry! :(

i was wondering if someone could double check the kerning for me as well as the porportion of the word-mark within the oblong.

thumbs up/down much appreciated
